<!DOCTYPE html> 
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Jolethen - Digital Terrain Builder & Mod Dev</title>
    
   
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.1/css/all.min.css" integrity="sha512-DTOQO9RWCH3ppGqcWaEA1BIZOC6xxalwEsw9c2QQeAIftl+Vegovlnee1c9QX4TctnWMn13TZye+giMm8e2LwA==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />
    
    <style>
       
        :root {
            --bg-color: #0d0221;
            --primary-color: #00d4ff;
            --secondary-color: #ff006e;
            --accent-color: #ffbe0b; 
            --text-color: #e0e0e0;
            --card-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            --card-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

       
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
            background-color: var(--bg-color);
            color: var(--text-color);
            overflow-x: hidden;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

      
        .particles {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: -1;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .particle {
            position: absolute;
            width: 4px;
            height: 4px;
            background: var(--primary-color);
            border-radius: 50%;
            opacity: 0.5;
            animation: float-up 15s infinite linear;
        }
        @keyframes float-up {
            from {
                transform: translateY(100vh) translateX(0);
                opacity: 0;
            }
            10% { opacity: 0.5; }
            90% { opacity: 0.5; }
            to {
                transform: translateY(-100vh) translateX(100px);
                opacity: 0;
            }
        }

        /* --- Navigation --- */
        header {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: rgba(13, 2, 33, 0.8);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            z-index: 1000;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        nav {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--primary-color);
        }
        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--text-color);
            text-decoration: none;
            margin: 0 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -5px;
            left: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--accent-color);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-links a:hover {
            color: var(--accent-color);
        }
        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* --- Hero Section --- */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .hero-content h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 5rem);
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            text-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.5);
        }
        .typing-effect {
            border-right: 3px solid var(--accent-color);
            animation: blink 1s step-end infinite;
        }
        @keyframes blink { 50% { border-color: transparent; } }
        
        .hero-content p {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.8;
        }
        .cta-button {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 1rem 2.5rem;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--secondary-color), var(--accent-color));
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }
        .cta-button:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.4);
        }

        /* Floating Blocks in Hero */
        .block {
            position: absolute;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2), rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.2));
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            animation: float 20s infinite ease-in-out;
        }
        .block1 { width: 80px; height: 80px; top: 10%; left: 10%; animation-delay: 0s; }
        .block2 { width: 60px; height: 60px; top: 70%; right: 10%; animation-delay: 3s; }
        .block3 { width: 100px; height: 100px; bottom: 10%; left: 15%; animation-delay: 5s; }
        @keyframes float {
            0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); }
            33% { transform: translateY(-30px) rotate(120deg); }
            66% { transform: translateY(30px) rotate(240deg); }
        }

        /* --- General Section Styling --- */
        section {
            padding: 5rem 2rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .section-title {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            text-shadow: 0 0 15px var(--primary-color);
        }

        /* --- Scroll Reveal Animation --- */
        .reveal {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(30px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        .reveal.active {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        /* --- About Section --- */
        .about-content {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        .about-text {
            flex: 2;
        }
        .about-text h3 {
            color: var(--accent-color);
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        .about-image {
            flex: 1;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .about-image img {
            width: 250px;
            height: 250px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.5);
        }

        /* --- Skills Section --- */
        .skills-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        .skill-card {
            background: var(--card-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--card-border);
            padding: 2rem;
            border-radius: 15px;
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .skill-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.3);
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
        }
        .skill-card h4 {
            color: var(--accent-color);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        .skill-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 10px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 5px;
            margin-top: 1rem;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .skill-level {
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
            border-radius: 5px;
            width: 0; 
            transition: width 1.5s ease-out;
        }
        .reveal.active .skill-level { 
             width: var(--skill-width);
        }

        /* --- Projects Section --- */
        .projects-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        .project-card {
            background: var(--card-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--card-border);
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }
        .project-card:hover {
            transform: scale(1.03);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(255, 190, 11, 0.3);
        }
        .project-card img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }
        .project-info {
            padding: 1.5rem;
        }
        .project-info h4 {
            color: var(--primary-color);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        .project-info p {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        .tech-tags {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 0.5rem;
        }
        .tech-tag {
            background: rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.2);
            color: var(--primary-color);
            padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            border: 1px solid var(--primary-color);
        }

        /* --- Timeline Section --- */
        .timeline {
            position: relative;
            padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        .timeline::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 2px;
            height: 100%;
            background: var(--primary-color);
        }
        .timeline-item {
            position: relative;
            width: 50%;
            padding: 2rem;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(-50px);
            transition: all 0.8s ease;
        }
        .timeline-item.active {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(even) {
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(50px);
        }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(even).active {
            transform: translateX(0);
        }
        .timeline-content {
            background: var(--card-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--card-border);
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }
        .timeline-content h4 {
            color: var(--accent-color);
        }
        .timeline-dot {
            position: absolute;
            top: 2rem;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            background: var(--secondary-color);
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 3px solid var(--bg-color);
        }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(odd) .timeline-dot { right: -10px; }
        .timeline-item:nth-child(even) .timeline-dot { left: -10px; }

        /* --- Contact Section --- */
        .contact {
            text-align: center;
        }
        .contact p {
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }
        .contact-links a {
            color: var(--text-color);
            font-size: 2rem;
            margin: 0 1rem;
            transition: color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
            display: inline-block; /* Ensures transform works well */
        }
        .contact-links a:hover {
            color: var(--primary-color);
            transform: scale(1.2);
        }
        
        /* --- Footer --- */
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 2rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--card-border);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }

        /* --- Responsive Design --- */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .nav-links a { margin: 0 0.8rem; font-size: 0.9rem; }
            .about-content { flex-direction: column; }
            .timeline::before { left: 31px; }
            .timeline-item { width: 100%; padding-left: 70px; padding-right: 25px; }
            .timeline-item:nth-child(even) { left: 0; }
            .timeline-item:nth-child(odd) .timeline-dot, .timeline-item:nth-child(even) .timeline-dot { left: 21px; }
        }

    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- Animated Background -->
    <div class="particles" id="particles"></div>

    <!-- Navigation -->
    <header>
        <nav>
            <div class="logo">Jolethen</div>
            <div class="nav-links">
                <a href="#hero">Home</a>
                <a href="#about">About</a>
                <a href="#skills">Skills</a>
                <a href="#projects">Projects</a>
                <a href="#experience">Experience</a>
                <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
            </div>
        </nav>
    </header>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="hero" id="hero">
        <div class="block block1"></div>
        <div class="block block2"></div>
        <div class="block block3"></div>
        <div class="hero-content">
            <h1>Digital Terrain Architect</h1>
            <p class="typing-effect">I build worlds, one block at a time. From Terraform to AI-assisted mods.</p>
            <a href="#projects" class="cta-button">View My Work</a>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- About Section -->
    <section id="about" class="reveal">
        <h2 class="section-title">About Me</h2>
        <div class="about-content">
            <div class="about-text">
                <h3>Hello! I'm a passionate creator in the digital space.</h3>
                <p>My journey started with in-game moderation, where I learned community and teamwork. This evolved into a deep love for world-building, mastering tools like WorldEdit and Terraform to craft stunning environments.</p>
                <p>Recently, Im on an exciting new path: mod development. Leveraging the power of AI, I'm rapidly learning to bring my unique ideas to life, even as a beginner. I believe the future of creation is collaborative, and I'm excited to be a part of it.</p>
            </div>
           
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Skills Section -->
    <section id="skills" class="reveal">
        <h2 class="section-title">My Skills</h2>
        <div class="skills-grid">
            <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>🌍 Terraform</h4>
                <p>Shaping landscapes and creating custom biomes.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 75%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>🔨 WorldEdit</h4>
                <p>Expert in large-scale and detailed block manipulation.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 90%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>⚙️ Techage</h4>
                <p>Building complex automated systems and machines.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 85%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>🤖 Mod Dev (AI)</h4>
                <p>Fast-learning beginner, using AI to create custom content.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 20%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
             <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>🛡️ Discord Mod</h4>
                <p>2 years of experience managing communities and servers.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 95%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="skill-card">
                <h4>👮 In-Game Mod</h4>
                <p>3 years ensuring fair play and helping players.</p>
                <div class="skill-bar">
                    <div class="skill-level" style="--skill-width: 95%;"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Projects Section -->
    <section id="projects" class="reveal">
        <h2 class="section-title">Project Showcase</h2>
        <div class="projects-grid">
            <!-- Project 1 -->
            <div class="project-card">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Custom Terrain Project">
                <div class="project-info">
                    <h4>Floating Island Archipelago</h4>
                    <p>A massive chain of custom floating islands created using a combination of Terraform for large shapes and WorldEdit for intricate details.</p>
                    <div class="tech-tags">
                        <span class="tech-tag">Terraform</span>
                        <span class="tech-tag">WorldEdit</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <!-- Project 2 -->
            <div class="project-card">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Techage Project">
                <div class="project-info">
                    <h4>Fully Automated Factory</h4>
                    <p>A complex, multi-level factory built entirely with Techage, capable of processing raw materials into finished goods with zero player intervention.</p>
                    <div class="tech-tags">
                        <span class="tech-tag">Techage</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
           
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Experience Timeline -->
    <section id="experience" class="reveal">
        <h2 class="section-title">My Journey</h2>
        <div class="timeline">
            <div class="timeline-item">
                <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                <div class="timeline-content">
                    <h4>Helper - Adventure Time</h4>
                    <p>Started my community journey by helping new players and moderating chat.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="timeline-item">
                <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                <div class="timeline-content">
                    <h4>In-Game Moderator</h4>
                    <p>3 years of experience across different servers, ensuring a safe and fun environment.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="timeline-item">
                <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                <div class="timeline-content">
                    <h4>Discord Moderator</h4>
                    <p>Took on a 2-year role managing a large Discord community, events, and user support.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="timeline-item">
                <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                <div class="timeline-content">
                    <h4>The Building Era</h4>
                    <p>Dove deep into WorldEdit, Terraform, and Techage, spending hundreds of hours creating.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="timeline-item">
                <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                <div class="timeline-content">
                    <h4> Mod Developer</h4>
                    <p>making mods for multicraft.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Contact Section -->
    <section id="contact" class="reveal">
        <h2 class="section-title">Let's Build Together!</h2>
        <p>I'm always open to discussing new projects, with you guys .
             if u want to contact me through discord here's my discord server link join fast..! 
                </p>
        </p>
        <div class="contact-links">
         
            <a href="https://discord.gg/6kxGhk2q"  target="_blank" title="Discord"><i class="fab fa-discord">
            </i></a>
            <a href="https://github.com/jolethen" target="_blank" title="GitHub"><i class="fab fa-github"></i></a>
           
        </div>
    </section>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2024 Jolethen Built with passion and a lot of coffee.</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // --- Particle Generation ---
        const particlesContainer = document.getElementById('particles');
        const particleCount = 50;
        for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
            const particle = document.createElement('div');
            particle.className = 'particle';
            particle.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + '%';
            particle.style.animationDelay = Math.random() * 15 + 's';
            particle.style.animationDuration = (15 + Math.random() * 10) + 's';
            particlesContainer.appendChild(particle);
        }

        // --- Scroll Reveal Logic ---
        const revealElements = document.querySelectorAll('.reveal');
        const timelineItems = document.querySelectorAll('.timeline-item');

        const handleScroll = () => {
            // Standard reveal elements
            revealElements.forEach(element => {
                const elementTop = element.getBoundingClientRect().top;
                const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
                if (elementTop < windowHeight - 100) {
                    element.classList.add('active');
                }
            });

            // Timeline elements
            timelineItems.forEach(item => {
                const itemTop = item.getBoundingClientRect().top;
                const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
                if (itemTop < windowHeight - 100) {
                    item.classList.add('active');
                }
            });
        };

        window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
        // Trigger on load in case page is already scrolled
        handleScroll();
    </script>

</body>
</html>
